content.text:
[cron:1174de62-0ca1-4e58-9ecb-e7c65f4965ec New Memecoin Launch Scanner] Use Moralis API to get 10 pump.fun tokens under $50K MC. Focus on HIGH HYPE tokens - ones with socials gaining traction. For each: search twitter/telegram presence. PRIORITIZE HYPE. Output table sorted by hype: Token | Contract | MC | Liquidity | Hype Scale (üî•üî•üî•/üî•üî•/üî•/üòê) | Dev | Status. Hype Scale: üî•üî•üî• = could hit $1M in 1-2 days (viral), üî•üî• = strong momentum, üî• = some buzz, üòê = quiet. Keep under 45 sec. Label 'EDUCATIONAL RESEARCH - High Risk'.
Current time: Wednesday, February 18th, 2026 ‚Äî 4:47 PM (America/New_York)

Return your summary as plain text; it will be delivered automatically. If the task explicitly calls for messaging a specific external recipient, note who/where it should go instead of sending it yourself.

async function fetchNewPumpFunTokens() { const response = await fetch( "https://solana-gateway.moralis.io/token/mainnet/exchange/pumpfun/new?limit=10", { headers: { accept: "application/json", "X-API-Key": "YOUR_API_KEY", }, } ); const data = await response.json(); // Display the tokens const tokenList = document.getElementById("token-list"); data.result.forEach((token) => { const tokenElement = document.createElement("div"); tokenElement.className = "token-card"; tokenElement.innerHTML = ` <h3>${token.name} (${token.symbol})</h3> <p>Price: $${parseFloat(token.priceUsd).toFixed(8)}</p> <p>Liquidity: $${parseInt(token.liquidity).toLocaleString()}</p> <p>Created: ${new Date(token.createdAt).toLocaleString()}</p> <a href="https://solscan.io/token/${ token.tokenAddress }" target="_blank">View on Solscan</a> `; tokenList.appendChild(tokenElement); }); } fetchNewPumpFunTokens();
<<<END_EXTERNAL_UNTRUSTED_CONTENT>>>

arguments.command: curl -s "https://api.dexscreener.com/latest/dex/tokens/solana" 2>/dev/null | python3 -c "import sys,json; d=json.load(sys.stdin); tokens=[t for t in d.get('pairs',[])[:30] if float(t.get('liquidity',{}).get('usd',0))<50000 and 'pump' in t.get('dexId','').lower()]; print(json.dumps(tokens[:10], indent=2))" 2>/dev/null
